MOM 1
KNOB: SIMPLE -> COMPLEX
F8 STOPS + NOTE OFF



#1
TR.P 1; SC.TR 91 0
PROB 20: BREAK
X N PN A RND 8
SC.CV.SLEW 91 RRND 400 3000
DEL 1000: SC.CV 91 X
DEL 1000: SC.TR 91 1

#2
TR.P 2; SC.TR 92 0
PROB 30: BREAK
Y N PN A RRND 3 12
SC.CV.SLEW 92 RRND 500 1500
DEL 1000: SC.CV 92 Y
DEL 1000: SC.TR 92 1

#3
TR.P 3; SC.TR 93 0
PROB 50: BREAK
Z N PN A RRND 8 15
SC.CV.SLEW 93 RRND 50 1000
DEL 1000: SC.CV 93 Z
DEL 1000: SC.TR 93 1

#4

#5

#6

#7

#8
M.ACT 0
SC.TR 91 0
SC.TR 92 0
SC.TR 93 0

#M
A PRM
M * 200 >> 64 RND 6
EVERY 13: $ 1
EVERY 7: $ 2
EVERY 3: $ 3
TR.P 4

#I
$ 8
PARAM.SCALE 0 3

#P
